channel.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
channel.description: when i run the aryan,it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT. why ,please help me?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

WhiteFang:

but if we get flagged, and we do NOT auto with the aryan, and only get some interface id’s, emotions and stuff with it? can they ban us (specially me) then for it? and will it effect my real character too?

EVERYONE IS FLAGGED ON RUNESCAPE WHETHER YOU AUTO OR NOT USING ARYAN OR RUNESCAPE.COM.

Any mod want to close this???

Read full topic

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @xPLaR xPLaR
item.description:
@xPLaR wrote:

i changed my breaks thing so that every 2-3 ours it will take a 20-30 min break. its been running perfectly and i havent gotten an account banned yet. been running bots for 3 days straight now. only reason i got some banned was because of myproblem with the axehandler which is fixed now

Read full topic
item.source: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @blackhat blackhat
item.description:
@blackhat wrote:

zappacky:

Seriously, it means Jagex is paying extra attention to that acct, and you prolly shouldnt auto when you get that message. (Or enjoy da ban!)

OMFG dude dont be lame,
It means Shit, Its a OLD outdated script (u using imps flag checker??)

EVERY ACCOUNT IS FALGGED SHOW ME ONE THATS NOT!

Also lets break a noob mith right here, I have been using aryan for 45 hrs now straght i do all the time shit iv ran for weeks straght before, I HAVE NEVER HAD A ACCOUNT BANNED, Just remember to talk every now and then and log off for a while,
Aryan doesit every 2hrs auto for you for a random time, If everything is random u have no problem, and the hole flag check bullshit is obserleet!

Hope this helps,
Tiddlies

Read full topic
item.source: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“coolpiglet, post:1, topic:1121”]when i run the aryan,it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT.
why ,please help me?[/quote]

OK, this is perfectly ok because jagex previously used this to make your account be watched more closely on the system if you had beeen lyk reported by 2 or 3 players or if you had been logged in for a while, so they decide to flag every single accout new or old, so that they could say they had an excellent new detection system and really they were just doing the same as before but modified it a little so that it was easier to catch people.

Well thats just my theory lol

edit: the reason its on one aryan and not the other is because the updater didnt remove it from the aryan code;) undrstand? if not post and i will try explain…

Read full topic
item.source: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Aryan is detected before you log in. You only get notified of it upon login. The traps not in the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @LIMiTER LIMiTER
item.description:
@LIMiTER wrote:

It’s probably only a way to make people nervous. I think they send the same package to all players, only the aryan users see it and they are like wtf?? what should I do??

I think you shouldn’t use aryan for your main because it’s so assumed that someday it’s gonna be banned.
But do what you wanna do, it’s your prob if it gets banned:)

Read full topic
item.source: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?

item.title: Why it say that JAGEX HAS FLAGGED YOUR ACCOUNT?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“coolpiglet, post:4, topic:1121”][quote author=Nerice link=topic=1076.msg10148#msg10148 date=1144322904]
They always flag people that use Aryan before they make a post.
[/quote]
But I use other aryan ,it didn’t say that
I have two aryan,one updated by me it say that ,but other one didn’t
How can i to do?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 06, 2006, 04:51:55 am[/size][hr][quote author=zappacky link=topic=1076.msg10154#msg10154 date=1144323744]
Seriously, it means Jagex is paying extra attention to that acct, and you prolly shouldnt auto when you get that message. (Or enjoy da ban!)
[/quote]

They always flag people that use Aryan before they make a post.

But I use other aryan ,it didn’t say that
I have two aryan,one updated by me it say that ,but other one didn’t
How can i to do?[/quote]
You can’t tell if you’re flagged anymore. Thanks to the jerkoffs that created Aryan, Jagex got smart and did something about it.

Read full topic
